item.title: I've built a Manjaro repository
item.description: Due to my own dumbness (I mistakenly deleted my Ubuntu partition), I installed Manjaro, using the Manjaro Architect release, on my laptop. I’d been thinking about doing it for a while and finally made it because I was too stupid to read the instructions from cfdisk. The shit you create yourself because you’re in a hurryâ€¦ Anyway, after installing Manjaro, I started reading a bit about this distro packaging and how I could leverage AUR and binary packages.
